attributes.action: save exmouths college for the future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: rolle college, exmouth has been a teaching college for many years,and a good one, now its going to be sold off by plymouth uni, as theY did for all the residentional accommodation. This college was promised to exmouth for our future overflowing children, and now the devon county council, now a (conservative council), are going to sell it, after millions of pounds of tax payers money was spent to refit it. our childrens future is in your hands, we and they need you, please help?
